type.name: BethIsraelSandaTSPPreval
type.description: Analysis, training set and diagnosis data, and ROC curves, describing the performance of TSP for the early diagnosis of prostate cancer.

keyval.val: TSP Pre-validation using Prostate Rapid Pre-Validation Set.

60 controls and 63 cases (half with Gleaason score <7 and half with Gleason score greather than or equal to 7) were obtained from five participating centers. TSP came in both normalized and unnormalized format. Each format had duplicate measures and the average was taken.
TSP did not perform and was not moved on for validation.

type.name: BethIsraelSandaDataMarkerPerformanceSummary
type.description: Data and Marker Performance Summary for three prostate markers hk2, hk4 and hk11.

keyval.val: Prostate pre-validation for hk2, hk4 and hk11.

Three markers (hk2, hk4 and hk11) were measured among 123 samples (60 controls, 63 cases). Among the cases, 33 had low Gleason grade (less than 7) and 30 had high Gleason grade (greather than or equal to 7).
In evaluating the performance of 163 markers, 3 samples (case) were missing due to QNS. 116 observations had PSA measured.
